content: it might come as a shock to you that this is a pattern for a very simple very low-frill basic hat no matter if this is your first-ever hat if you are looking for some standard version as a starting point for your own improvisations or if you simply enjoy the beauty of a clear design this might just be the project for you you ll need one ball of yarn for this hat in its most basic one-colour version if you want to add stripes you need yarn scraps for those too of course there are instructions and yarn suggestions included for versions of the hat inspired by the flags of iceland norway orkney and åland as always you ll find youtube-tutorials showing you all the techniques needed for this hat so have fun and good luck with your project volker
